segments.text: Hello , thank you for taking the time to interview me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi there , I ’ m Bill Gotcha , the owner of Gotcha Enterprises . Did you find your way here OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you switching jobs at this point in your career ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our Company is moving overseas and I wish to stay in the United States .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am good at organizing systems that have been having problems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is your biggest challenge in terms of skills ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t like to sit around and so like to always find things to do to keep myself busy .
segments.speaker: S1
